mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ASS_PHOTO_ACCEPT (
group_id ,
hos_id ,
copy_code ,
accept_no ,
photo_code ,
photo_name ,
file_url ,
spell_code ,
wbx_code ,
is_stop ,
) VALUES (
#{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{accept_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{photo_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{photo_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{file_url,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{spell_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{wbx_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{is_stop,jdbcType=INTEGER}
)
mapper.select: SELECT group_id, hos_id, copy_code, accept_no, photo_code, photo_name, file_url, spell_code, wbx_code, is_stop FROM ASS_PHOTO_ACCEPT WHERE group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and accept_no = #{accept_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and photo_code = #{photo_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
